00023 template <typename Attribute>
00024 class TAttributeMemberBase
00025 {
00026 public:
00027        typedef Attribute AttributeType;
00028        typedef typename Attribute::ValueType AttributeValueType;
00029        typedef void InterfaceType;
00030 
00031        TAttributeMemberBase();
00032 
00040        bool Init(    const IComponent* ownerPtr,
00041                             const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00042                             const IComponent** definitionComponentPtr = NULL);
00043 
00047        bool IsValid() const;
00048 
00052        const Attribute* GetAttributePtr() const;
00053 
00057        const Attribute* operator->() const;
00058 
00062        const AttributeValueType& operator*() const;
00063 
00064 protected:
00065        void SetAttribute(const Attribute* attributePtr);
00066 
00067 private:
00068        const Attribute* m_attributePtr;
00069 };

00074 template <typename Attribute>
00075 TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::TAttributeMemberBase()
00076 :      m_attributePtr(NULL)
00077 {
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 template <typename Attribute>
00082 bool TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::Init(
00083                      const IComponent* ownerPtr,
00084                      const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00085                      const IComponent** definitionComponentPtr)
00086 {
00087        I_ASSERT(ownerPtr != NULL);
00088 
00089        const QByteArray& attributeId = staticInfo.GetAttributeId();
00090        const IComponentContext* componentContextPtr = ownerPtr->GetComponentContext();
00091        if (componentContextPtr != NULL){
00092               int definitionLevel = -1;
00093               const iser::IObject* attributePtr = componentContextPtr->GetAttribute(attributeId, &definitionLevel);
00094               m_attributePtr = dynamic_cast<const Attribute*>(attributePtr);
00095 
00096               if (m_attributePtr != NULL){
00097                      I_ASSERT(definitionLevel >= 0);
00098 
00099                      if (definitionComponentPtr != NULL){
00100                             while (definitionLevel > 0){
00101                                    ownerPtr = ownerPtr->GetParentComponent();
00102                                    I_ASSERT(ownerPtr != NULL);
00103 
00104                                    --definitionLevel;
00105                             }
00106 
00107                             *definitionComponentPtr = ownerPtr;
00108                      }
00109 
00110                      return true;
00111               }
00112        }
00113        else{
00114               m_attributePtr = NULL;
00115        }
00116 
00117        return false;
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 template <typename Attribute>
00122 bool TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::IsValid() const
00123 {
00124        return (m_attributePtr != NULL);
00125 }
00126 
00127 
00128 template <typename Attribute>
00129 const Attribute* TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::GetAttributePtr() const
00130 {
00131        return m_attributePtr;
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 template <typename Attribute>
00136 const Attribute* TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::operator->() const
00137 {
00138        return m_attributePtr;
00139 }
00140 
00141 
00142 template <typename Attribute>
00143 const typename TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::AttributeValueType& TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::operator*() const
00144 {
00145        I_ASSERT(m_attributePtr != NULL);  // operator* was called for invalid object, or no IsValid() check was called.
00146 
00147        return m_attributePtr->GetValue();
00148 }
00149

00153 template <typename Attribute>
00154 void TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>::SetAttribute(const Attribute* attributePtr)
00155 {
00156        m_attributePtr = attributePtr;
00157 }

00160 // other constructs used for special template for QString attribute
00161 
00162 template <typename Attribute>
00163 class TAttributeMember: public TAttributeMemberBase<Attribute>
00164 {
00165 };
00166 
00167 
00168 template <>
00169 class TAttributeMember< TAttribute<QString> >: public TAttributeMemberBase< TAttribute<QString> >
00170 {
00171 public:
00172        QString operator*() const
00173        {
00174               return QCoreApplication::translate("Attribute", TAttributeMemberBase< TAttribute<QString> >::operator*().toAscii());
00175        }
00176 };
